text: 1:4 2 Korin 7:1; Efesus 4:24; 2 Pita 2:18-20; 1 Jon 3:2Egha bizir bar aghuiba e ganɨngi, da bar ekefe. Ezɨ kar bizir a fomɨra e danɨngasa akam akɨriziba. E nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba, e navir ghurimɨn araziba bagha puv agoima, da bar pazav e gami. Ezɨ Krais bizir aghuir kaba bar e ganɨngi. Tuavir kamɨn, a ian akuraghtɨ, ia arazir kurar kabagh itaghɨva, egh Godɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim inighɨva egh an arazibar amuam.
